00030 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_UNARY_INRANGE_H
00031 #define CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_UNARY_INRANGE_H
00032 
00033 // Checks if a variable is in a fixed Range.
00034 template<typename Var>
00035   struct WatchInRangeConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00036 {
00037   virtual string constraint_name()
00038     { return "WatchedInRange"; }
00039 
00040   Var var;
00041 
00042   DomainInt range_min;
00043   DomainInt range_max;
00044 
00045   template<typename T>
00046   WatchInRangeConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, const Var& _var, const T& _vals) :
00047   AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var(_var)
00048   { 
00049     if(_vals.size() != 2)
00050     {
00051       cerr << "The range of an 'inrange' constraint must contain 2 values!" << endl;
00052       abort();
00053     }
00054     
00055     range_min = _vals[0];
00056     range_max = _vals[1];
00057   }
00058 
00059   int dynamic_trigger_count()
00060     { return 2; }
00061 
00062   virtual void full_propagate()
00063   {  
00064     var.setMin(range_min);
00065     var.setMax(range_max);
00066   }
00067 
00068 
00069   virtual void propagate(DynamicTrigger* dt)
00070   {
00071     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(WatchInRange);
00072     D_FATAL_ERROR("Propagation is never called for 'in range'");
00073   }
00074 
00075   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00076   {
00077     D_ASSERT(v_size == 1);
00078     return (v[0] >= range_min && v[0] <= range_max);
00079   }
00080 
00081   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00082   { 
00083     vector<AnyVarRef> vars;
00084     vars.reserve(1);
00085     vars.push_back(var);
00086     return vars;
00087   }
00088 
00089   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00090   {  
00092     int min_val = max(range_min, var.getMin());
00093     int max_val = min(range_max, var.getMax());
00094     for(int i = min_val; i <= max_val; ++i)
00095     { 
00096       if(var.inDomain(i))
00097       {
00098         assignment.push_back(make_pair(0, i));
00099         return true;
00100       }
00101     }
00102     return false;
00103   }
00104 };
00105 
00106 template<typename VarArray1>
00107 AbstractConstraint*
00108 BuildCT_WATCHED_INRANGE(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray1& _var_array_1, const ConstraintBlob& b)
00109 { 
00110   return new WatchInRangeConstraint<typename VarArray1::value_type>
00111     (stateObj, _var_array_1[0], b.constants[0]); 
00112 }
00113 
00114 #endif
